questions.question: What does a program contain?
questions.answer: A program contains a routine of exercises, a nutrition part, and tips to help you stay motivated and achieve your goals.

questions.question: How can I know if a program is suitable for my level?
questions.answer: No worries, our programs are suitable for all levels, from beginner to professional.

questions.question: What is the duration of a program?
questions.answer: It depends on your goal and level, but generally, a program lasts between 4 and 12 weeks.

questions.question: How were the programs created?
questions.answer: They were created by AI and then adjusted and validated by professionals.

questions.question: How can I sign up for a program?
questions.answer: Just click on the program that interests you, choose your goal, sign up, and follow the instructions.

questions.question: Can I get a refund if I am not satisfied?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a free refund within 7 days if you are not satisfied.

TOS.title: Terms of Use of MyBodyProgram
TOS.description:
Welcome to MyBodyProgram, a platform dedicated to selling PDF programs focused on sports, nutrition, and well-being. By using our site, you agree to comply with these terms of use, which we have established to ensure a secure and compliant experience for all our users. Please read these terms carefully before continuing to browse or make a purchase.



1. Access and registration: To purchase PDF programs on our site, you must register. Registration is done through our secure payment system, provided by Stripe. The user must provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration.



2. Intellectual property: All content available on the blog and PDF programs is protected by copyright and remains the exclusive property of the site creator. It is strictly forbidden to reproduce, distribute, or share this content without prior authorization. Any violation of these rights may result in legal action.



3. Use of PDF programs: Programs purchased on this site are reserved for personal use. It is prohibited to resell, share, or distribute them in any form, whether for free or commercially.



4. Payments and refunds: Purchases of PDF programs are final. No refund or exchange requests will be accepted, except in the case of proven technical issues during the file download.



5. Limitation of liability: The programs available on this site are offered as advice and support. We disclaim any liability for injury, damage, or unexpected results arising from the use of the programs. It is recommended to consult a health professional before following a sports or dietary program.



6. Abusive use: Any attempt to hack, abuse, or engage in harmful behavior on the site will result in the immediate suspension of the user's account and may lead to legal action.



7. Modifications to services: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue all or part of the services offered on the site at any time, without notice. However, we currently do not anticipate any major suspension of services.



8. Personal data: We use tracking tools (Hotjar, Google Analytics, Vercel Tracking) to improve the user experience. No personal data is sold to third parties. By using this site, you consent to the use of these tools.



9. Jurisdiction: These terms are governed by French law. Any dispute will be submitted to the jurisdiction of the competent courts of Lyon, France.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy of MyBodyProgram
PrivacyPolicy.description:
At MyBodyProgram, we take our users' privacy seriously. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our site.



1. Information collection: We collect personal information that you provide to us during registration and purchase of programs, such as your name, email address, and payment information. We also collect data through tracking tools like Hotjar, Google Analytics, and Vercel Tracking.



2. Use of information: The information collected is used to process your purchases, improve the user experience, and personalize our services. We also use this data for statistical and analytical purposes to better understand the use of our site.



3. Sharing of information: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except in the context of processing payments via Stripe, or if required by law.



4. Data security: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or disclosure.



5. Cookies and tracking tools: We use cookies and tracking technologies (Hotjar, Google Analytics, Vercel Tracking) to collect information about your use of the site and improve our services. You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect some features of the site.



6. Your rights: You have the right to request access, rectification, or deletion of your personal information. For any request, please contact us at the address indicated on the site.



7. Changes to the privacy policy: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page and will take effect immediately.



8. Contact: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy, you can contact us via our contact form available on the site.
